input.sentences: [female] and [male] having fun prior to going to the party .
[male] and [female] looking civil before the party .
[female] flexing her muscles in a scary pose .
[male] looks awful frightening in his skeleton mask .
output.sentences: We finally arrived to the party.
We walked around for a bit and took a few pictures together.
He tried to take an especially scary picture of himself, but it looked hilarious.
Other people just arrived to the party and they laughed at his attempts to be scary.
Even though some thought it was scary, the skeleton in the corner was just observing.
